title: mta
content:
# mta.yaml

```yaml
ID: solution2911b
version: 1.0.0
_schema-version: '3.1'
parameters:
  hcp-deployer-version: 1.1.0
modules:
- name: manageproductsneo2911
  type: com.sap.hcp.html5
  path: html5-app-folder
  build-parameters:
    builder: zip, grunt, fetcher (choose one)
    fetcher-opts:
      repo-type: maven
      repo-coordinates: group-id:artifact-id:version:type:classifier
    grunt-opts:
    - clean
  parameters:
    name: manageproductsneo2911
    permissions:
    - role: role2
      name: AccessNorthwindBackend
    version: 1.0.0
  requires:
  - name: role2
  - name: northwind
- name: role2
  type: com.sap.hcp.html5.role
  path: dummy
  parameters:
    name: role2
- name: northwind
  type: com.sap.hcp.destination
  path: dummy
  parameters:
    additional-properties:
      WebIDEEnabled: 'true'
      WebIDEUsage: odata_gen
    authentication: NoAuthentication
    name: northwind
    proxy-type: Internet
    type: HTTP
    url: https://services.odata.org

```
